item.description:
Nick Carraway, a Midwesterner now living on Long Island, finds himself fascinated by the mysterious past and lavish lifestyle of his neighbor, Jay Gatsby. He is drawn into Gatsby's circle, becoming a witness to obsession and tragedy.

Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tobey Maguire, Carey Mulligan, Isla Fisher, Joel Edgerton
Director: Baz Luhrmann

 

Due to Mother's Day, I'm moving the regular Sunday movie to Tuesday.  Rave has $5 movie night on Tuesdays. 

The movie starts at 7:15 but please meet no later than 7:00.  Tuesday nights are VERY busy at this theater due to the discounted movie prices.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby by the entrance to the restaurant
item.name: The Great Gatsby
